lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: Yes, that's the person we're looking for.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: Hold on, he's dangerous. We should think of a plan before we attack.
Wait, he's moving toward us. I have an idea.

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: You got it. Now let's give this guy some payback.

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: That bastard. I can't believe him. How could he not support me? I just want what's rightfully ours.

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: Well, if it isn't Genevieve. Has your father decided to accept my demands?

lines.speaker: Marcus
lines.text: Darn, he's been alerted. We can't attack now.

lines.speaker: Amelia
lines.text: We were so close! Who is this girl?

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: I'm here to tell you to give up, Faust. My father won't give in no matter how much you threaten him.

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: Oh? Did he send you? Makes sense. A coward like him couldn't tell that to my face.

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: He didn't send me. I'm stopping you myself.

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: All by yourself? That was a mistake.
It's true your father won't accept my demands now, but what about for his daughter?

lines.speaker: Genevieve
lines.text: Go away and never bother my father again!

lines.speaker: Faust
lines.text: Argh! Luckily I prepared for this.
